description: Django models for a word-guessing game platform, including models for words, game sessions, and guesses with associated metadata and logic.

classes.name: TimeStampedModel
classes.description: Abstract base model providing created and updated timestamp fields.

classes.name: Word
classes.description: Model representing a valid word for the game, with fields for text, length, and activity status.

classes.name: GameSession
classes.description: Model representing a single game session, including target word, attempts, mode, and timing info.

classes.name: Guess
classes.description: Model representing a single guess within a game session, including guess text, result, and metadata.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Normalizes and saves the Word or Guess instance, updating relevant fields.

methods.name: mark_completed
methods.description: Marks a game session as completed and records whether it was won.

methods.name: __str__
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the model instance.
